title: Why does my Pixel 3a XL tell me "Regular updates have ended for this device"?
content: When I select settings/security/security update, the above message appears,along with the Android version (11), and the last security update (February 5, 2020). Below that it states that my phone will no longer receive regularly scheduled system or security updates. Yet according to the Google chart, my phone should receive these until May 2022. WTH?
